section.section:
Subject to paragraph (2) of this subsection, this title does not apply to the sale of a prescription drug:
made to an authorized provider; or
made by a manufacturer, wholesale distributor, or pharmacist licensed by the State to:
another manufacturer, wholesale distributor, or pharmacist licensed by the State; or
a hospital or institution that operates a dispensary in which an authorized provider licensed to administer prescription drugs is in charge.

A sale is exempt from this title only if a record of the sale:
is maintained and available for inspection; and
shows the date of sale, the name and address of the purchaser, and the quantity purchased.

text.section:
This title does not apply to:
the distribution of a prescription drug, device, or supply for the treatment, care, or cure of farm animals, poultry, fowl, or other animals used in furtherance of farming activities;
the sale or offering for sale, or the distribution of seeds, feed for livestock and poultry, fertilizers, lime, land plaster, fungicides, and insecticides; or
a drug that on June 1, 1961, could be sold without a prescription.
